import React from "react"; import { getDefaultOtherPlatforms } from "./utils"; /** * GameForm Component - Oyun ekleme formu (platform, durum, s√ºre vb.) * @param {Object} props - Component props * @param {string} props.platform - Se√ßilen platform * @param {Function} props.setPlatform - Platform'u ayarlar * @param {Array} props.platforms - Platform listesi * @param {string} props.gameStatus - Oyun durumu * @param {Function} props.setGameStatus - Durumu ayarlar * @param {string} props.totalPlaytime - Toplam oynama s√ºresi * @param {Function} props.setTotalPlaytime - S√ºreyi ayarlar * @param {Array} props.campaigns - Campaign'ler * @param {Function} props.setIsCampaignMode - Campaign modunu ayarlar * @param {Array} props.selectedDlcs - Se√ßilen DLC'ler * @param {boolean} props.isAddingGame - Oyun ekleniyor mu? * @param {Function} props.handleAddGame - Oyun ekleme fonksiyonu * @param {boolean} props.editMode - D√ºzenleme modu * @param {string} props.error - Hata mesajƒ± */ const GameForm = ({ platform, setPlatform, platforms, gameStatus, setGameStatus, totalPlaytime, setTotalPlaytime, campaigns, setIsCampaignMode, selectedDlcs, isAddingGame, handleAddGame, editMode, error, }) => { // Diƒüer platformlar i√ßin varsayƒ±lan liste ve IGDB ile birle≈üik se√ßenekler const otherPlatforms = getDefaultOtherPlatforms().concat( Array.isArray(platforms) ? platforms.map((p) => p?.name).filter(Boolean) : [], ); return (

{editMode ? "Oyunu D√ºzenle" : "K√ºt√ºphaneye Ekle"}

{/* Platform Se√ßimi */}
{/* Ana Platformlar - Butonlar */}
{[ { name: "Steam", icon: "üéÆ", color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600", }, { name: "Epic Games", icon: "üöÄ", color: "from-gray-700 to-gray-800", }, { name: "PlayStation", icon: "üéÆ", color: "from-blue-600 to-blue-700", }, { name: "Xbox", icon: "üéÆ", color: "from-green-500 to-green-600", }, ].map((p) => ( ))}
{/* Diƒüer Platformlar - Dropdown */}

setTotalPlaytime(e.target.value)} placeholder="√ñrn: 25 saat, 2.5h, 150 dakika" className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-white/5 border border-white/20 rounded-lg text-white placeholder-gray-500 focus:outline-none focus:border-[#00ff88]/50" data-ers="add-game-modal.playtime" />

); }; export default GameForm;

import React, { useState, useMemo, useEffect } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import NotificationHistory from "./NotificationHistory"; export default function AdminNotifications({ notificationTitle, notificationMessage, notificationType, setNotificationTitle, setNotificationMessage, setNotificationType, sendToAll, setSendToAll, selectedUsers, onUserSelection, onSelectAllUsers, isSendingNotification, onSendNotification, notificationHistory, users, setSelectedNotificationId, loadUserReadStats, userReadStats, selectedNotificationId, }) { const [page, setPage] = useState(0); const pageSize = 10; const totalPages = Math.max( 1, Math.ceil((notificationHistory?.length || 0) / pageSize), ); const pagedHistory = useMemo( () => (notificationHistory || []).slice(page * pageSize, (page + 1) * pageSize), [notificationHistory, page], ); useEffect(() => { // reset page when history changes so we don't show an empty page if (page > 0 && (notificationHistory?.length || 0) <= page * pageSize) { setPage(0); } }, [notificationHistory, page, pageSize]); return (
